eTargeting.model
Class CampaignsModel

java.lang.Object
  eTargeting.model.CampaignsModel

public class CampaignsModel
extends java.lang.Object

The CampaignsModel class represents a campaign.

A campaign is represented by the following information:

  • A unique ID.
  • A name.
  • A sender name.
  • A sender email.
  • A subject
  • A content
  • A creation date
  • A schedule date
  • An execution date
  • A list

Version:
1.0
Author:
Axel
See Also:
Model
